entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9607] It is expected that NoncontrollingInterests with a value of -590,000 reported in the network role http://www.pl.kruk.eu/role/BalanceSheet, http://www.pl.kruk.eu/role/ChangesInEquity should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 590,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.pl.kruk.eu/role/ChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of NoncontrollingInterests : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/259400T1FZYBIW8XUJ78/2021-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/esef_SSF_GRUPAKRUK-2021-12-31.zip/esef_SSF_GRUPAKRUK-2021-12-31/reports/esef_SSF_GRUPAKRUK-2021-12-31.xhtml 15759
